title: First-team debut for FC Barcelona
summary: Lionel Messi makes his official debut at just 17, beginning the greatest story in Barça history.
detail: On 16 October 2004, Messi debuted for Barcelona against Espanyol. It marked the start of an era that would redefine football and the identity of the club.

title: The rise of Guardiola’s Barcelona
summary: Tiki-taka football, domination of possession, and Messi’s evolution into a world star.
detail: Under Pep Guardiola, Barcelona created one of the most dominant teams in football history, winning historic trophies with Messi as the focal point.

title: The greatest individual season
summary: Messi breaks records and produces the most prolific scoring season ever.
detail: In 2011–12, Messi scored an unbelievable 73 goals in all competitions, setting a new world record and confirming his status as the best player of his generation.

title: Adapting to new systems
summary: Tactical changes around him, but Messi remains the heartbeat of the team.
detail: Despite managerial changes and tactical shifts, Messi continued to dominate games and deliver decisive performances.

title: MSN: Messi, Suárez, Neymar
summary: One of the most dangerous attacking trios in football history.
detail: The MSN trio led Barcelona to a historic treble in 2015, combining creativity, goals, and perfect chemistry.

title: The complete playmaker
summary: Messi transforms into the team’s main creator and leader.
detail: During this period, Messi dropped deeper, dictated tempo, created chances, and still remained Barcelona’s top scorer.
stats: Leadership: On and off the pitch

title: Carrying the club
summary: Messi keeps Barcelona competitive during one of its most difficult transitions.
detail: Even in challenging seasons, Messi remained the top performer and the emotional leader of the squad.

title: The greatest legend of FC Barcelona
summary: A legacy that will define the club forever.
detail: Lionel Messi left Barcelona as the club’s all-time top scorer and appearance maker, rewriting football history and becoming the greatest icon in Barça’s existence.
stats: Status: Greatest player in club history
